mapper.select: SELECT A.ACNT_NO, A.CSTM_ID, A.CSTM_NM, A.ACNT_NM, A.NEW_DTM, H.ACNT_BLNC FROM TB_ACNT A , (SELECT ACNT_BLNC, ACNT_NO FROM TB_TRNS_HST H WHERE ACNT_NO IN (SELECT ACNT_NO FROM TB_ACNT WHERE ACNT_NO = #{acntNo}) AND SEQ = (SELECT MAX(SEQ) FROM TB_TRNS_HST WHERE ACNT_NO = H.ACNT_NO AND STS_CD = '1')) H WHERE A.ACNT_NO = H.ACNT_NO AND A.ACNT_NO = #{acntNo}

SELECT A.ACNT_NO, A.CSTM_ID, A.CSTM_NM, A.ACNT_NM, A.NEW_DTM, H.ACNT_BLNC FROM TB_ACNT A , (SELECT ACNT_BLNC, ACNT_NO FROM TB_TRNS_HST H WHERE ACNT_NO IN (SELECT ACNT_NO FROM TB_ACNT WHERE CSTM_ID = #{cstmId}) AND SEQ = (SELECT MAX(SEQ) FROM TB_TRNS_HST WHERE ACNT_NO = H.ACNT_NO AND STS_CD = '1')) H WHERE A.ACNT_NO = H.ACNT_NO AND CSTM_ID = #{cstmId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ACNT(ACNT_NO, CSTM_ID, CSTM_NM, ACNT_NM, NEW_DTM) VALUES(#{acntNo}, #{cstmId}, #{cstmNm}, #{acntNm}, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: SELECT ACNT_BLNC FROM TB_TRNS_HST WHERE ACNT_NO = #{acntNo} AND SEQ = (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(SEQ),0) FROM TB_TRNS_HST WHERE ACNT_NO = #{acntNo} AND STS_CD = '1')
mapper.insert:

INSERT INTO TB_TRNS_HST(ACNT_NO, SEQ, DIV_CD, STS_CD, TRNS_AMT, ACNT_BLNC, TRNS_BRNCH, TRNS_DTM) VALUES(#{acntNo}, ${seq}, #{divCd}, #{stsCd}, #{trnsAmt}, #{acntBlnc}, #{trnsBrnch}, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: SELECT ACNT_NO, SEQ, DIV_CD, STS_CD, TRNS_AMT, ACNT_BLNC, TRNS_BRNCH, TRNS_DTM FROM TB_TRNS_HST WHERE ACNT_NO = #{acntNo} ORDER BY ACNT_NO
